Articles.Content:
One other person had this problem with no fix as far as the bug tracker shows: https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/19195

The issue: I right click. The cursor changes color. I drag and the view rotates approximately 1 degree and then stops. Further dragging only scrolls up and down as if I were not holding the right mouse button. The cursor remains the same right-click color until I let go.

The setup: I have a fresh install with Steam on Linux. No addons. All settings are defaults (I changed some graphical settings before I played, but I reset everything just in case). I've tested this with Bumblebee enabled and disabled. I don't have Synergy or anything that interferes with input running.

I have previously run KSP on the same setup (Manjaro, xorg, i3) with no issues. I don't believe there is anything substantially different from my previously working setup.

Edit 08/25/19 08:10: It only doesn't work when using the touchpad. I hooked up a mouse and it works fine (it also works fine through Synergy).

Edit 09:04: I can rotate the view by a two finger click and then using a third finger to scroll.
